entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
